name: SiteURL

screenshots.caption: Find URL dialog: quickly retrieve one or more URL(s)
Main window (top list: web documents, bottom list: URLs)
Confirm Edit dialog: displays all impacted web documents
Edit URLs dialog (4 tabs for 4 distinct URLs editors)
Web Document Info dialog: shows information about documents
URL Info dialog: shows information about URLs

short_description: SiteURL is a GUI tool that lets you view and edit in a few clicks all the URLs (hypertext links, images locations, ...) contained in your web sites.
